meanings.definition: To change the size of something.
meanings.sent1: She was resizing the image to make it smaller.
meanings.sent2: I need to resize this photo before printing it.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried resizing itself to fit into the tiny box.
meanings.sent4: His perspective on life was resizing as he traveled the world.
meanings.sent5: The magician resized the rabbit to fit into his hat.

meanings.definition: The act of adjusting the dimensions of an object.
meanings.sent1: The resizing of the table made it fit perfectly in the room.
meanings.sent2: The resizing of the dress was necessary for the fashion show.
meanings.sent3: The resizing of the cake resulted in a comically tall dessert.
meanings.sent4: The resizing of the building made it look like a miniature model.
meanings.sent5: The resizing of the map helped travelers navigate more easily.
